title.newValue: Microsoft Viva: Access your Viva Learning assignments from Viva briefing email

description.newValue:
,[We've paused sending briefing emails starting early 2023 and this service will continue to stay paused until further notice.] With Viva Learning and Viva email (formerly briefing email) integration, users can keep a track of their due/overdue assignments from Viva email.
GA date: November CY2022
Preview date: October CY2022
